commit.message:
Deployment (#89)

* Installed Prettier

* Create .prettierignore

* Installs tailwindcss

* Configures tailwindcss

* Add prettier

* test commit

* Removed eslint

* removed eslint

* Added a duration (in ms) to club events to allow for the determination of an end time.

* Added accept-sponsor and testcases for accept-sponsor and accept-hacker

* Finished tests for hacker routes

* Change testing libraries to dev dependencies

* Remove old src folder

* Sets up basic landing page

* WIP: CSS GRID

* Fixes css grid bug

* Add register button

* Adds social media icons with links

* Completed tests for all group routes with 100% coverage. I collaborated with Simon to modify group models and API in order for tests to work.

* Fixed linter issues.

* Fixed another linter issue.

* Created admin routes to manually add users (#66)

* Created routes to manually add users

These routes create hackers and sponsors but require admin priveleges and skip the email verification process. Unit tests were also created for these new routes.

* Fixed linter issues

* Fixed more linter issues

* WIP: Got ugly logo to appear

* Working popup menu finished

* remove unused files

* Remove import that doesn't exist anymore

* moved some stuff and started adding stuff

* Implements Routing and creates pages folder

* Make register button a link

* Kube manifests should be completed, and added a workflow to deploy everything to azure kubernetes

* modified images in kube manifests to match their final form

* Added horizontal pod autoscaling to backend pod. Added manifest for rabbitmq pod. Refractored some names/labels in the manifests to make everything cleaner.

* Extract Menu into a component

* Adds some responsiveness to Landing page

* Extracts grid layout to seprate file for simplification

* Improves mobile design

* Adds comments to worked on files

* working on getting gunicorn working, need to fix backend connection with nginx

* Fixed group API bug.

* Fixed linter issues. FYI, linter detected some issues with /backend/python/src/api/admin.py, however, I did not modify it in this PR.

* Delete pull_request_template.md

* replace KH logo

* Rewrite README.md

* docker-compose-dev.yml works properly with backend, frontend, and everything else

* Frontend kube works, problem with backend, issue with gunicorn

* autoscaler works for the backend just fine, now need to fix ssl issue with backend

* I didn't add all the files

* Added Discord bot to repo as submodule so we can deploy the discord bot in the same kube cluster as the front and backend servers

* updated branch in .gitmodules

* Update .gitmodules

* fixed errors and updated dockerignores

* Updated kube config and docker compose to include discordbot

* Update deploy.yml

* Update Dockerfile

* finalized dockerfiles

* Removed error in models.user.py and finished implementation of kubernetes deployment manifests

* fixed code quality issues

* Update deploy.yml

* Update .gitmodules

* Update docker-compose-dev.yml
